meanings.definition: A subdivision or section of a larger chapter or book.
meanings.sent1: In the textbook, the subchapter about photosynthesis was very informative.
meanings.sent2: I found the subchapter on ancient civilizations to be particularly interesting.
meanings.sent3: The subchapter on dinosaurs made me wish I could travel back in time!
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a long novel, with each year being a different subchapter.
meanings.sent5: The subchapter on space exploration was so captivating that I couldn't put the book down.

meanings.definition: A small chapter within a larger book or document.
meanings.sent1: The subchapter on healthy eating habits was easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy reading the subchapter on famous inventors in history books.
meanings.sent3: The subchapter on gardening tips made me want to start my own garden.
meanings.sent4: Each day of our trip felt like a new subchapter in our adventure.
meanings.sent5: The subchapter on marine life was filled with colorful illustrations that brought the topic to life.
